attributes.action: Immediately ban Inland Revenue, VAT, DVLA, TV Licensing and other government/national departments from using 08xx numbers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of 08xx numbers is costing the country millions in lost productivity as Self Assessment, VAT and benefit departments introduce call centres using premium 08xx numbers that are staffed by outsourcers who are incapable of resolving queries. The public deserve to speak to the specific individual in the department handling their case - not to hold in a queue to speak to a faceless, unknown and inexperienced individual working in a far flung call centre that neither has the authority nor capability to resolve the issue.
